conbody.p: You can purchase licenses via the Purchase Order (PO) payment method. Once the Purchase Order is paid, you need to provide us your Katalon Organization information. Do as follows:

ol.li: Click on the dropdown button on the top left to select your desired Account.
Copy and send the Account's URL containing its ID and the Account Owner's email account to the Katalon team.

conbody.p: After confirming your Account URL and payment, our team will grant the purchased licenses to your Account within 24 business hours. The licenses are generated and added directly to your account.
